trans-unit.source: Provides a way to customize ASP.NET behavior at run time that overrides the ASP.NET code access security policy.
trans-unit.target: 提供一种自定义重写 ASP.NET 代码访问安全策略的 ASP.NET 运行时行为的方法。

trans-unit.source: In complex Web hosting environments such as SharePoint and Web farms, you might have to extend the ASP.NET code access security policy.
trans-unit.target: 在复杂的 Web 宿主如 SharePoint 和 Web 场环境中，你可能需要将 ASP.NET 代码访问安全策略扩展。

trans-unit.source: By extending the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostSecurityPolicyResolver> type, you can implement custom security policy behavior that overrides the ASP.NET code access security policy.
trans-unit.target: 通过扩展<xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostSecurityPolicyResolver>类型，则可以实现重写的 ASP.NET 代码访问安全策略的自定义安全策略行为。

trans-unit.source: Configuring a HostSecurityPolicyResolver Class
trans-unit.target: 配置 HostSecurityPolicyResolver 类

trans-unit.source: In the configuration files, you can configure a custom <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostSecurityPolicyResolver> instance by adding the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TrustSection.HostSecurityPolicyResolverType%2A> attribute to the element.
trans-unit.target: 在配置文件中，你可以配置自定义<xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostSecurityPolicyResolver>加上实例<xref:System.Web.Configuration.TrustSection.HostSecurityPolicyResolverType%2A>属性的元素。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TrustSection.HostSecurityPolicyResolverType%2A> attribute can be set to the name of the custom <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostSecurityPolicyResolver> type that will be loaded by ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TrustSection.HostSecurityPolicyResolverType%2A>属性可以设置自定义的名称为<xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostSecurityPolicyResolver>将加载的 ASP.NET 的类型。

trans-unit.source: The attribute value contains the fully qualified name of the derived type.
trans-unit.target: 属性值包含派生类型的完全限定的名称。

trans-unit.source: By default, [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] does not set this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: The following syntax shows how to configure the attribute:
trans-unit.target: 下面的语法演示了如何配置属性：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TrustSection.PermissionSetName%2A> attribute in the `trust` element can be set to a string value that indicates which named permission set in a partial trust configuration file should be used.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TrustSection.PermissionSetName%2A>属性中`trust`元素可以设置为字符串值，该值指示应使用在部分信任配置文件中设置的命名的权限。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET 4 sets this attribute to "ASP.Net".
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，ASP.NET 4 中设置此属性与"ASP.Net"。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TrustSection.HostSecurityPolicyResolverType%2A> attribute in the `trust` element indicates the custom <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostSecurityPolicyResolver> object that will be loaded by ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TrustSection.HostSecurityPolicyResolverType%2A>属性中`trust`元素指示自定义<xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostSecurityPolicyResolver>将加载的 ASP.NET 的对象。

trans-unit.source: If the attribute is set to an empty string, the application uses the ASP.NET default logic for determining the permissions for the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 如果该属性设置为一个空字符串，应用程序将使用 ASP.NET 的默认逻辑来确定程序集的权限。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostSecurityPolicyResolver> type attribute cannot be set to a null value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostSecurityPolicyResolver>类型属性不能设置为 null 值。

trans-unit.source: The assembly that contains a derived <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostSecurityPolicyResolver> type must run with full trust, because the custom type provides information that ASP.NET can use to elevate assemblies to full trust.
trans-unit.target: 包含派生的程序集<xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostSecurityPolicyResolver>类型必须运行完全信任，因为自定义类型提供了可以使用 ASP.NET 提升为完全信任程序集的信息。

trans-unit.source: In general, you should deploy a custom policy resolver type in the global assembly cache, where it will run with full trust.
trans-unit.target: 一般情况下，你应该部署中的全局程序集缓存，其中它将在其中运行以完全信任的自定义策略冲突解决程序类型。

trans-unit.source: When you implement this class, you must override the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostSecurityPolicyResolver.ResolvePolicy%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 当您实现此类时，必须重写<xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostSecurityPolicyResolver.ResolvePolicy%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the <xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence> instance that is passed as a parameter, the method returns an enumeration value that indicates the security policy to apply to the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 具体取决于<xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence>实例，它是作为参数传递，该方法返回一个枚举值，该值指示要应用于程序集的安全策略。

trans-unit.source: The set of available security policies is determined by the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostSecurityPolicyResults> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 可用的安全策略集由<xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostSecurityPolicyResults>枚举。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.Configuration.TrustSection.HostSecurityPolicyResolverType" /> attribute has an invalid value or cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.Configuration.TrustSection.HostSecurityPolicyResolverType" /> 特性值无效或找不到。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the inheriting type.
trans-unit.target: 表示有关继承的类型的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能由部分受信任的代码继承。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Hosting.HostSecurityPolicyResolver" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Hosting.HostSecurityPolicyResolver" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A collection of evidence about an assembly and a host, which is used as an input to security policy.
trans-unit.target: 有关程序集和宿主的证据集合，该证据用作安全策略的输入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the security policy that should be applied to an assembly.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示应向程序集应用的安全策略。

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates the type of security permissions should be applied to an assembly.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，该值指示应向程序集应用的安全权限类型。

trans-unit.source: If you inherit from the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostSecurityPolicyResolver> class, you must implement the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostSecurityPolicyResolver.ResolvePolicy%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果从继承<xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostSecurityPolicyResolver>类，则必须实现<xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostSecurityPolicyResolver.ResolvePolicy%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Based on the information that is provided in the `evidence` parameter, the method should return one of the security policies that are defined in the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostSecurityPolicyResults> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 中提供的信息基于`evidence`参数，该方法应返回中定义的安全策略之一<xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostSecurityPolicyResults>枚举。
